website_summaries.verdict: No better option for some rustic appeal. Get the added benefit of extra serving space with three separate trays for the price of one.
pros: Beautiful surface finish that combines the looks of aged wood with the durability of modern materials
Trays nest into each other for convenient storage
cons: Serving trays can flake if scratched or dented with enough force

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: These are a good value for the price. They aren't really sealed so that maybe an issue if you spill drinks frequently in them. I plan on using a coat of polyurethane on them to help with that. I keep one on my ottoman and another on my dining table and they were fine for the purpose I'm using them for. I wouldn't say they would be great for actual food serving bc of the sealing issue. You may want laquer trays if you are going for that.
customer_reviews.author: SomeoneOutThere

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Rustic Trays at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: They look great and customer service was outstanding! The 3 trays arrived quickly and they look just like the picture. We are using the small tray for our remote controls in the living room and using the other 2 trays for beverages and food. All the trays feels sturdy and the rustic grey look is spot on! Unfortunately, the small tray had a broken handle when it arrived. I spoke with the company and they treated me well, handled my issue quickly and refunded my money immediately. Highly recommend these trays if you're looking for a rustic grey decor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone down hill
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first set and loved it! I use the trays all the time for my mobile bar service in Hawaii. My second set was NoT the same quality.The large tray was broken immediately out of the package and flimsy. I was so busy with wedding season that I missed the window of time to return it. Super bummed!
customer_reviews.author: MAUI GG

customer_reviews.title: Super useful, perfect sizes!
customer_reviews.text: Probably my favorite purchase from amazon, ever. We use these trays every single day. I have an ottoman instead of coffee table, so we bring drinks or snacks to the living room on these trays. They are super handy when we are sick (it’s been a lot since Thanksgiving) and need to eat or drink in bed. They’re great companions for playing video games or binging Netflix shows on the sofa bed while sipping a cocktail. I use these to play with play doh with my toddler, so she doesn’t get it on the couch or rug. I can’t think of a single thing we use in this house more than these trays.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decorative & Functional
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. The trays are nice sizes. The biggest tray holds my kitchen items, the medium has the coasters and remotes. The small one is in my office for holding miscellaneous items. The definitely make things look less cluttered. The trays are sturdy and sit flat with no warp-wobble.
customer_reviews.author: JaimeShopsHere

customer_reviews.title: I was very pleased with these trays
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with these trays. The distressed look was exactly what I wanted, they look better than the picture. Have each tray in separate rooms for holding items. Great value. I may order another set soon, blend in well, a lot of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money! So trendy and work in any space!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Put the large one in our upstairs living room, the medium one down in the man cave and the smallest one I used in my bathroom on top of the toilet tank! Great value for the money! Well made and free of any splitting or cracking in the wood - and it’s soft! Who’s have thought it’d be soft? But it is!
customer_reviews.author: M C

customer_reviews.title: Felt like plywood
customer_reviews.text: Pretty trays but they felt like they were made out of the thin wood that model airplanes are made of (plywood wood). Didn’t seem like they would last long, especially if you put drinks on them.
customer_reviews.author: Esther Elmer

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I am so surprised these are on here for so cheap. I got these so I could customize them as a gift! They are great. The look and feel good. They hold vinaly and paint well. Only negative was the chemical smell but it just smelled like they were stained before shipping. I’ll be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, useful and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: These trays are really nice and we use them daily! My they are a very light wood but we like that when we use them for dinner trays.
customer_reviews.author: J.C.

customer_reviews.title: Pictures of these don't do them justice!! They are AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.text: OH MY GOSH!!! THESE TRAYS ARE SO PERFECT!! THE PICS DON'T DO THEM ANY JUSTICE!! WE JUST REMODELD OUR HOUSE, AND I USED THE SMALL ONE ON MY GRANITE COUNTER FOR MY TOASTER!! AND I'M GOING TO USE THE OTHER TWO FOR DECORATING MY HOUSE!! I JUST LOVE LOVE LOVE...
customer_reviews.author: erin

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: We use this in multiple ways. Eating, placing our cups and remotes. Recommend to others

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Came with 2 broken. Contacted the store and they happily refunded me no problems. Very cheap, looked nice but I’m just glad it didn’t break while carrying a dinner plate.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Not as good looking as in the photo. Appear very cheap, do not recommend

customer_reviews.text: super versatile, sturdy, and matches our other kitchen stuff. we use these all the time. well made, nice looking, and comfortable to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jean

customer_reviews.title: Come in handy!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about these trays. I tend to eat in bed or living room sofa so these are really helpful in terms of cleanliness. I've spilled food on them and they havent been ruined. Recommend for everyone!

customer_reviews.title: Interesting finish, well made.
customer_reviews.text: These look great. The finish is unusual, almost an animal fur quality. Also well made. Great value.

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Good quality

customer_reviews.text: I love the different sizes. They are sturdy and lightweight. I can use them on the couch or ottoman. They could be a bit lower in price.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Love these trays!

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect in our condo in Hawaii which has beach-bleach vinyl-plank ...
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect in our condo in Hawaii which has beach-bleach vinyl-plank flooring the same look. They are nesting, so easy to store - and small enough so they are not awkward for carrying drinks and appetizers out to the TV area or lanai. Made well, they are rustic - so they are not fussy, and will do well in a rental condo. Kihei Kai Nani unit 205 - building one - view of the beach! 2495 South Kihei Road, Maui, Hawaii - right across from Kamaole 2. Newly remodeled, just about to be rented through MauiRental.com, once we get pictures taken. 11/18/2017
customer_reviews.author: R. Corff

customer_reviews.title: Nice trays!
customer_reviews.text: The trays are perfect. I use one on my ottoman, and one on my kitchen island.
customer_reviews.author: RJH

customer_reviews.title: High-Quality Set of Trays for a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set of trays to use the two larger ones on two new nightstands - both as a design feature and to protect the tops of the nightstands. They are perfect! I am certain they would be excellent for serving breakfast in bed or for dining anywhere there is not not enough room at the dining table. In addition to being sturdy and structurally sound, the rustic finish is also extremely well done. The trays provide the finishing touch for my newly-redone guest bedroom. I have set the small one aside for now, but I am sure I will find a the ideal spot for it soon!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Twitty

customer_reviews.title: So great for gathering and/or showing off items
customer_reviews.text: Using the larger one for my coffee bar. Well made. Beautifully distressed. Great farmhouse rustic look. All sizes come in handy and look good nested...
customer_reviews.author: LolasMom

customer_reviews.title: Use these every day
customer_reviews.text: We like to eat and drink on or near the couch so we use these almost every day. They are light and sturdy and perfect to double as a tray when eating. Plus they look and feel great.

customer_reviews.title: they have held up nicely and look beautiful

customer_reviews.title: Ottoman Buddy
customer_reviews.text: Have a large ottoman. This is a perfect compliment and a great way to avoid spills / messes on the ottoman. Completely satisfied with this product.

customer_reviews.title: The trays were even better than we had hoped
customer_reviews.text: The trays were even better than we had hoped. I was concerned that the finish might not be smooth enough and snag the fabric on our sofa, but that's not the case. They are very smooth. And they are very lightweight, which was a nice surprise. They look great!

product_meta.title: Country Rustic Torched Wood Nesting Breakfast Serving Trays with Handles, Set of 3
feature_bullets: Set of 3 natural wood rectangular serving nesting trays with weathered rustic torched finish.
Trays nest into one another, allowing for convenient storage. Each tray contains two cutout handles for easy portability.
Perfect for serving appetizers, cocktails, breakfast in bed or used as a decorative ottoman or coffee table tray.
Approximate Dimensions (in inches): Large Tray - 16.5 W X 2 H X 12 D; Medium Tray - 14.5 W X 2 H X 10.5 D; Small Tray - 12.5 W X 2 H X 9 D.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars154 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
